name: Examples of Evaluation of Subforms to Places
up: Overview of Places and Generalized Reference

sections.type: Examples of Evaluation of Subforms to Places
sections.text:
(let ((ref2 (list '())))
        (push (progn (princ "1") 'ref-1)
              (car (progn (princ "2") ref2))))
      |>  12
     =>  (REF1)
      (let (x)
         (push (setq x (list 'a))
               (car (setq x (list 'b))))
          x)
     =>  (((A) . B))
push first evaluates (setq x (list 'a)) =>  (a), then evaluates (setq x
(list 'b)) =>  (b), then modifies the car of this latest value to be ((a)
. b).
